name: TikTok Standard Video
primary_goal_vibe: Discovery, entertainment, and fast micro-education driven by the For You page.
tone_preference: Direct, human, and energetic. Informal but clear. Hook- and retention-first.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: The visual and on-screen text in the first 1–3 seconds must communicate the hook. The caption is secondary and should give minimal context, keywords, and a clear CTA. Avoid long paragraphs; focus on one idea per video.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Line 1: reinforce the hook or promise. Line 2: short context or key detail. Final line: CTA.

on_screen_text_guidelines.primary_role: Carry the main message and hook, especially for sound-off viewers.
best_practices: State the promise or problem in the first seconds
Time text changes with scene changes

hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Mix topic, niche, and audience-intent tags (for example industry + problem + audience). Avoid irrelevant trending tags.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag creators or brands only if they are contextually involved or referenced in the video.

technical_constraints.recommended_duration: 6–30 seconds for most content; up to 60–90 seconds for deeper explanations.
technical_constraints.safe_area_note: Keep faces and text away from top and bottom edges to avoid UI overlays.

required_elements: Clear visual hook in the first 1–3 seconds
On-screen text or subtitles for sound-off viewing
At least one CTA in caption or spoken
disallowed_practices: Slow intros or logo animations before value
Captions that explain multiple unrelated ideas
Clickbait hooks unrelated to the content
